entry.title: Open Access Journal: Journal for Semitics - Tyjdskrif vir Semitistiek
entry.content:
Journal for Semitics - Tyjdskrif vir Semitistiek
ISSN 1013-8471
The Southern Africa Society for Near Eastern Studies (SASNES) has its own journal, Journal for Semitics (JSem), first published in 1989. The journal is accredited by the South African Department of Education and is published twice a year. Occasionally a special third number may be published in a volume. Journal for Semitics (ISSN 1013-8471) is published for SASNES by Unisa Press and printed by the Production Department, University of South Africa.

1. Journal for Semitics, vol. 01, no. 1, (1989).
2. Journal for Semitics, vol. 01, no. 2, (1989).
3. Journal for Semitics, vol. 02, no. 1, (1990).
4. Journal for Semitics, vol. 02, no. 2, (1990).
5. Journal for Semitics, vol. 03, no. 1, (1991).
6. Journal for Semitics, vol. 03, no. 2, (1991).
7. Journal for Semitics, vol. 04, no. 1, (1992).
8. Journal for Semitics, vol. 04, no. 2, (1992).
9. Journal for Semitics, vol. 05, no. 1, (1993).
10. Journal for Semitics, vol. 05, no. 2, (1993).
11. Journal for Semitics, vol. 06, no. 1, (1994).
12. Journal for Semitics, vol. 06, no. 2, (1994).
13. Journal for Semitics, vol. 07, no. 1, (1995).
14. Journal for Semitics, vol. 07, no. 2, (1995).
15. Journal for Semitics, vol. 08, no. 1, (1996).
16. Journal for Semitics, vol. 08, no. 2, (1996).
17. Journal for Semitics, vol. 09, no. 1 & 2, (1997).
18. Journal for Semitics, vol. 10, no. 1 & 2, (1998-2001).
19. Journal for Semitics, vol. 11, no. 1, (2002).
20. Journal for Semitics, vol. 11, no. 2, (2002).

21. Journal for Semitics, vol. 12, no. 1, (2003).
22. Journal for Semitics, vol. 12, no. 2, (2003).
23. Journal for Semitics, vol. 13, no. 1, (2004).
24. Journal for Semitics, vol. 13, no. 2, (2004).

28. Journal for Semitics, vol. 15, no. 2, (2006)
